panels.description: Pods that are Ready==true in key namespaces.
panels.title: Ready Pods (Key NS)

panels.description: Are core CloudRadar targets scraping successfully?
panels.title: Ingester
Control Plane CPU (Real / Requests / Limits) (% allocatable)

targets.expr: 100 * sum((sum by (node) (label_replace(sum by (nodename) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!~"idle|iowait|steal"}[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))) / clamp_min(sum((kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"}) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))), 0.001)

100 * sum((sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"} * on(namespace,pod) group_left(node) kube_pod_info)) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))) / clamp_min(sum((kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"}) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))), 0.001)

100 * sum((sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu"} * on(namespace,pod) group_left(node) kube_pod_info)) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))) / clamp_min(sum((kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"}) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))), 0.001)

100 * sum((sum by (node) (label_replace(sum by (nodename) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!~"idle|iowait|steal"}[5m]) * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) and on(node) ((kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))) / clamp_min(sum((kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"}) and on(node) ((kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))), 0.001)

100 * sum((sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_requests{resource="cpu"} * on(namespace,pod) group_left(node) kube_pod_info)) and on(node) ((kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))) / clamp_min(sum((kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"}) and on(node) ((kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))), 0.001)

100 * sum((sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu"} * on(namespace,pod) group_left(node) kube_pod_info)) and on(node) ((kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))) / clamp_min(sum((kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="cpu"}) and on(node) ((kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))), 0.001)

panels.title: Control Plane RAM (Real / Requests / Limits) (% allocatable)

targets.expr: 100 * sum((sum by (node) (label_replace(sum by (nodename) ((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes - node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes) * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))) / clamp_min(sum((kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory"}) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))), 1)

100 * sum((sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory"} * on(namespace,pod) group_left(node) kube_pod_info)) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))) / clamp_min(sum((kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory"}) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))), 1)

100 * sum((sum by (node) (label_replace(sum by (nodename) ((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes - node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes) * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info), "node", "$1", "nodename", "(.*)"))) and on(node) ((kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))) / clamp_min(sum((kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory"}) and on(node) ((kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))), 1)

100 * sum((sum by (node) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="memory"} * on(namespace,pod) group_left(node) kube_pod_info)) and on(node) ((kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))) / clamp_min(sum((kube_node_status_allocatable{resource="memory"}) and on(node) ((kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master|node-role.kubernetes.io/master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))), 1)

topk(1, ((max by (instance) (100 * (1 - (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{fstype!~"tmpfs|overlay|squashfs",mountpoint="/"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{fstype!~"tmpfs|overlay|squashfs",mountpoint="/"}))) * on(instance) group_left(node) label_replace(max by (node, internal_ip) (kube_node_info), "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))

topk(1, ((max by (instance) (100 * (1 - (node_filesystem_avail_bytes{fstype!~"tmpfs|overlay|squashfs",mountpoint="/"} / node_filesystem_size_bytes{fstype!~"tmpfs|overlay|squashfs",mountpoint="/"}))) * on(instance) group_left(node) label_replace(max by (node, internal_ip) (kube_node_info), "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")) and on(node) (kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"})))))

topk(1, (((100 * sum by (instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="iowait"}[5m])) / clamp_min(sum by (instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total[5m])), 1e-09)) * on(instance) group_left(node) label_replace(max by (node, internal_ip) (kube_node_info), "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")) and on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"}))))

topk(1, (((100 * sum by (instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="iowait"}[5m])) / clamp_min(sum by (instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total[5m])), 1e-09)) * on(instance) group_left(node) label_replace(max by (node, internal_ip) (kube_node_info), "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")) and on(node) (kube_node_info unless on(node) (max by (node) (kube_node_spec_taint{key=~"node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane|node-role.kubernetes.io.master"} or kube_node_role{role=~"control-plane|master"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_control_plane="true"} or kube_node_labels{label_node_role_kubernetes_io_master="true"})))))

panels.title: Redis Keys (db0)
panels.description: Number of keys in Redis DB0 (redis-exporter).

panels.title: Bandwidth (RX/TX) (max)
panels.description: Color scale uses a fixed max of 1 Gbps (pre-anomaly signal). This is a dashboard scale, not a guaranteed NIC line rate.

targets.expr: topk(1, (sum by (instance) (rate(node_network_receive_bytes_total{device!~"lo|cni.*|flannel.*|veth.*|docker.*|kube-ipvs0"}[5m])) * 8) * on(instance) group_left(node) label_replace(max by (node, internal_ip) (kube_node_info), "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)"))

topk(1, (sum by (instance) (rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{device!~"lo|cni.*|flannel.*|veth.*|docker.*|kube-ipvs0"}[5m])) * 8) * on(instance) group_left(node) label_replace(max by (node, internal_ip) (kube_node_info), "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)"))

topk(1, (max by (instance) (rate(node_netstat_Tcp_RetransSegs[5m])) * on(instance) group_left(node) label_replace(max by (node, internal_ip) (kube_node_info), "instance", "$1:9100", "internal_ip", "(.*)")))
